Package inventory

Class Medicine

  • java.lang.Object
    • inventory.Medicine
  • public class Medicine
extends java.lang.Object
    The Medicine class represents a medicine with its different attributes

      • setQuantity

        public void setQuantity​(int quantity)
        This sets the new quantity of this Medicine. It also checks if the new quantity is below the lowStockQuantity and updates lowStockAlert accordingly
        Parameters:
        quantity - new quantity of Medicine
